head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DAVIDSON, MARIAN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DAVIDSON, MARIAN J.

block.p: DAVIDSON-Marian J. Of Locust Valley, NY, April 1, 1998. Devoted mother of Helen Austin Davidson, Matthew Halstead Davidson and Marian Livingston Davidson. Sister of John G. Jackson. Memorial service St. John's of Lattingtown, Saturday 1 PM. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to Marian Davidson Memorial Fund for Melanoma, The Skin Cancer Foundation, 245 5th Avenue, Suite 1403, New York City 10016.
